resources.string: Student 👨‍🎓 | Learner | Creative Web and App Design 📱 | Tech Enthusiast 🖥️ | Aspiring Software Developer | currently learnimg Android App Devlopment 🎯

As a final semester BCA student, I\'ve honed my skills in C, C++, and web & App design through both college coursework and online certifications. My goal is to land an entry-level position in a vibrant organization where I can apply my technical and leadership acumen to propel the company . My passion lies in software development, and I\'m enthusiastic about seizing challenging opportunities . With a solid foundation and a hunger for growth.
